|castingnoise=5 |spellnoise=15 }} {{flavour|This spell violently unbinds the magic which keeps the caster's summoned creatures in this world, engulfing anything near them in a maelstrom of magical force. The more powerful the creature released, the stronger the resulting backlash will be.}} '''Forceful Dismissal''' is a level 6 [[Summonings]] spell which immediately dismisses all of your current summoned creatures. In the process, all monsters standing adjacent to them take irresistible, unavoidable damage. Damage formula is (1+ summon HD/4)d(7 + spellpower/8). ==History== *Forceful Dismissal was removed in [[0.16]]. *Forceful Dismissal was added in [[0.14]]. [[Category:Obsolete spells]]
